basic.Peptide Name: M-zodatoxin-Lt5a (M-ZDTX-Lt5a; Latarcin-5, Ltc-5; spiders, Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.16735513]Gram-positive bacteria:Arthrobacter globiformis VKM Ac-1112 (MIC=1.1 µM), Bacillus subtilis VKM B-501 (MIC=0.6 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DH5-alpha (MIC=0.6 µM), Escherichia coli MH1 (MIC=0.6 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC=18 µM);Fungi:Pichia pastoris GS115 (MIC>37 µM), Saccharomyces cerevisiae Y190 (MIC>37 µM).
